name: TerraMaster
tagline: Don't just sync your scenery; Master it!
body:
## TerraMaster
### GUI for managing FlightGear scenery collections

* Visualize your FlightGear scenery collections on a world map.
* Add and update scenery tiles from the FlightGear? scenery server.
* Remove unwanted scenery tiles.

### TerraMaster lets you do all this using a simple point-and-click interface.

It's written in Java so it'll work on Windows, Mac, Linux, etc.

![sample screenshot](http://terramaster.googlecode.com/files/terramaster_r30.png)
------

#### Acknowledgements

This software makes use of

1. The SVNKit library from TMate Software
http://svnkit.com
2. Free icons from Aha-Soft
http://www.small-icons.com/packs/24x24-free-application-icons.htm
3. The Global Self-consistent, Hierarchical, High-resolution Geography Database (GSHHG)
https://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/mgg/shorelines/gshhs.html
4. FlightGear multiplayer map server for airport & navaid lookup
http://mpmap02.flightgear.org
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
